datafield.subfield: Shi qi shi tian wen zhu zhi zhi yan jiu /

Ben shi xi Zhu Wenxi xian sheng yi zhu, zuo zhe geng ju Shi ji, Han shu deng shi qi shi zhong you guan tian wen, lü li fang mian de cai liao, jia yi zheng li er ti ju qi yao, bing xu shu le wo guo gu dai ke xue jia zai tian wen, li fa fang miang zhi zhong yao cheng jiu, dui yan jiu Zhongguo tian wen xue shi you yi ding de can kao jia zhi. Ben shu shi zuo zhe 1930-1935 nian de wei ding gao, yi chang guan dian you yi zheng tong guan nian jiao yan zhong, xi wang du zhe zhu yi.
十七史天文诸志之研究 /
本书系朱文鑫先生遗著，作者根据史记，汉书 等十七史中有关天文，律历方面的材料，加以整理而提举其要，并叙述了我国古代科学家在天文，历法方面之重要成就，对研究中国天文学史有一定的参考价值. 本书是作者1930-1935年的未定稿，立场观点尤以正统观念较严重，希望读者注意.

datafield.subfield: Zhejiang Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo

Ben shu shi Zhejiang Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo jin nian fa jue de Nan Song mu zang de kao gu bao gao jie ji. Zhe pi Song mu chu le di xia mu shi yi sui zang pin wai, ge mu jun bao cun you can zheng bu deng de di biao fen yin yuan yi ji yi ji xiang dang de jian zhu gou jian, zhe shi fu yuan yan jiu Nan Song yin yuan zhi du de di yi shou zi liao.
Zhejiang Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo
浙江省文物考古研究所.
本书是浙江省文物考古研究所近年发掘的南宋墓葬的考古报告结集. 这批宋墓除了地下墓室及随葬品外，各墓均保存有残整不等的地表茔园遗迹以及相当的建筑构件，这是复原研究南宋茔园制度的第一手资料.
浙江省文物考古研究所,

datafield.subfield: Huang He xia you wen ming jin cheng de zhong yao jie duan /
Huang He xia you wen ming jin cheng de zhong yao jie duan
Longshan culture : An important stage of the process to the civilization of the Lower Yellow River Valley
Important stage of the process to the civilization of the Lower Yellow River Valley

Ben shu shi yi bu Longshan wen hua yan jiu de zong he zhi zuo. Dui Longshan wen hua fen qi, di fang lei xing hua fen deng zuo le quan mian tan tao. Fen bie shi yi ding he yu wei biao zhun, dui Longshan wen hua lei xing he kong jian cha yi cheng du de fen xi, shi yi zhong xin de ren shi. Tong guo dui bu tong lei xing yi cun de fen xi, dui Longshan wen hua de sheng chan li shui ping, she hui fen gong, she hui fen ceng, she hui jie gou ji zu zhi guan xi wen ti ye dou you yan jiu.
黄河下游文明进程的重要阶段 /
黄河下游文明进程的重要阶段
本书是一部龙山文化研究的综合之作。对龙山文化分期，地方类型划分等作了全面探讨。分别是以鼎和鬻为标准，对龙山文化类型和空间差异程度的分析， 是一种新的认识。通过对不同类型遗存的分析，对龙山文化的生产力水平，社会分工，社会分层，社会结构及组织关系问题也都有研究.

datafield.subfield: Shi qi shi yong hen ji xian wei guan cha de yan jiu /

Du shu suo de chu de jie lun, dui wo men ren shi ren lei wen hua de fa zhan yu zi ran huan jing de hu dong yi cun guan xi, dang jin ren lei dui zi ran huan jing de kai fa yu bao hu jiang you suo qi di.
石器使用痕迹显微观察的研究 /
该书所得出的结论, 对我们认识人类文化的发展与自然环境的互动依存关系, 当今人类对自然环境的开发与保护将有所启迪.
Kao gu xin shi ye cong shu

1954年四川省博物馆在巴县和昭化县70多座古墓葬的发掘报告。该考古材料可以部分的说明这一地区公元前四世纪末到公元前一世纪末期的历史概况，尤其是对研究这里古代巴族的文化发展和活动，以及和汉族文化的影响关系。出土的铜兵器，表现了古代巴蜀文化的特色，它和云南石寨山出土的铜兵器，在形制和艺术风格上有颇多的影响和联系。

Research and exploration : Xia Shang Zhou bronze culture
Table of contents and prefactory matters also in English.

Ben shu shou lu le Li Xiandeng xian sheng jin 30 nian lai cong shi Xia Shang Zhou kao gu xue ji qing tong qi, bu wen zi yan jiu de zhu yao lun wen 40 pian. Di yi bu fen chan shu le Zhongguo gu dai wen ming qi yuan yu Xia wen hua de te dian, di er bu fen lun shu le Zhongguo gu dai qing tong qi de qi yuan, te dian, duan dai yu fen qi, qing tong qi jian ding de li lun yu fang fa, di san bu fen lun shu le Zhongguo wen zi qi yuan wen ti, bing zhu lu le yi pi xin fa xian de jia gu wen, tao wen zi liao.
本书收录了李先登先生近30年来从事夏商周考古学及青铜器，古文字研究的主要论文40篇。第一部分阐述了作者对于中国古代文明起源与夏文化的特点，第二部分论述了中国古代青铜器的起源，特点，断代与分期，青铜器鉴定的理论与方法，第三部分论述了中国文字起源问题，并著录了一批新发现的甲骨文，陶文资料.

datafield.subfield: by William Y. Adams ; with contributions by Nettie K. Adams.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Greco-Scythian art and the birth of Eurasia :
from classical antiquity to Russian modernity /
Oxford studies in ancient culture and representation

Introduction : Discovering Greco-Scythian art -- Classical art and Russian identity -- Defining the corpus : Chronology, technique, distribution -- Political monuments of the early Spartocid State -- Looking at Greco-Scythian art -- Greco-Scythian art in practice -- Conclusion.

Since their discovery in nineteenth-century Russia, Greco-Scythian artefacts have been interpreted as masterpieces by Greek craftsmen working according to the tastes of the Scythian nomads and creating realistic depictions of their barbarian patrons. Drawing on a broad array of evidence from archaeology, art history and epigraphy to contextualize Greco-Scythian metalwork in ancient society, this volume confronts the deep confusion between ancient representation and historical reality in contemporary engagements with classical culture. It argues that the strikingly life-like figure scenes of Greco-Scythian art were integral to the strategies of a cosmopolitan elite who legitimated its economic dominance by asserting an intermediary cultural position between the steppe inland and the urban centres on the shores of the Black Sea.
Oxford studies in ancient culture and representation

datafield.subfield: Wu ta si you ming Zhen jue si, chuang jian yu Ming dai Yong le nian (1403-1424), qi zhu ti Jin gang bao zuo ta shi Yindu Fo tuo jia ye jing she ( Shijiamoni de dao wai Jiayeshan si suo jian de ji nian ta) xing shi de fo ta, kan cheng Ming dai jian zhu he shi diao yi shu de dai biao zhi zuo, ye shi zhong wai wen hua jie he de dian fan, Qing wang chao jian li hou, Qianlong ge qi mu zuo shou liang ci chong xiu Wu ta si, zi Qing chao hou qi kai shi, Wu ta si zhu jian shuai luo.
Beijing, Wen wu chu ban she, 1957
五塔寺又名真觉寺，创建於明代永乐年(1403-1424年)，其主体金刚宝座塔是印度佛陀伽耶精舍（释迦牟尼得道处迦耶山寺所建的纪念塔）形式的佛塔, 堪称为明代建筑和石雕艺术的代表之作，也是中外文化结合的典范. 清王朝建立後，乾隆为给其母做寿曾两次重修五塔寺. 自清朝後期开始，五塔寺逐渐衰落.

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Wuguo qing tong qi zong he yan jiu /
Xiao Menglong, Liu Wei zhu bian.

Ben shu yi Zhenjiang bu wu guan suo cang Wu guo qing tong qi wen zhu, pang ji Jiangsu, Anhui, Zhejiang deng di li nian suo chu ge kuan Wu guo qing tong qi, yi duo xue ke xie zuo de fang shi zuo zong he xing yan jiu. Wu tuo zai Chunqiu Zhanguo zhan you zhong yao di wei, Wu wen hua shi you Zhongyuan he tu zhu wen hua rong he er cheng de qu yu wen hua. Wu guo qing tong qi cong xing zhi, wen shi, he jin cheng fen dao zhi zuo gong yi deng fang mian jun you xian ming de di qu te zheng, it xian le Wu guo ke xue ji shu fa zhan de gao shui ping ji wen hua te se.
Wuguo qing tong qi zong he yan jiu.
Beijing : Ke xue chu ban she, 2004
本书以镇江博物馆所藏吴国青铜器为主，旁及江苏，安徽，浙江等地历年所出各款吴国青铜器，以多学科协作的方式做综合性研究。吴国在春秋战国时期占有重要地位，吴文化史是由中原文化和土著文化融合入而成的区域文化。吴国青铜器从形制，纹饰，合金成分到制作工艺等方面均有鲜明的地区特征，体现了吴国科学技术发展的高水平及文化特色.

datafield.subfield: Suizhou Shi bo wu guan bian zhu ; zhu bian Huang Jianxun ; fu zhu bian Xiong Yan.
Tomb No. 2 at LeiGuDun in SuiZhou

Leigudun er hao mu shi ji Zeng hou yi mu zhi hou Hubei Diqu de you yi zuo ji qi zhong yao de Zeng guo wang shi da mu. Ben shu quan mian fa biao le er hao mu zang xing zhi ji chu tu de 449 jian yi wu de zi liao. Chu tu yi wu zhong you yi qing tong qi jiao duo, gong 328 jian, qi zhong han jiu ding, ba gui ji 36 jian qing tong jiao deng, wei yan jiu Zeng (Sui) wen hua ji qi yu Chu de guan xi ti gong le zhong yao de shi wu zi liao.
Beijing : Wen wu chu ban she, 2008
随州市博物馆编著 ; 主编黄建勋 ; 副主编熊燕.
擂鼓墩二号墓是继曾侯乙墓之后湖北地区的又一座极其重要的曾国王室大墓. 本书全面发表了二号墓葬形制及出土的449件遗物的资料. 出土遗物中尤以青铜器较多, 共328件, 其中含九鼎, 八簋及36件青铜角钟等, 为研究曾(随)文化及其与楚的关系提供了重要的实物资料.

datafield.subfield: Sichuan Pendi de qing tong shi dai /

Ben shu shi zuo zhe chang qi cong shi si chuan pen di qing tong shi dai kao gu yu li shi yan jiu de lun wen hui bian, ye shi yi bu zhong guo qing tong shi dai qu yu wen hua yan jiu de zhuan zhu. Zou zhe shi tu an zhao kao gu xue yan jiu de zheng que tu jing, cong dian xing yi zhi fen xi ru shou, zhu jian shang shen zhi wen hua he wen hua xi tong de yan jiu, bing tong guo gai di qu zhong yao de yi zhi he yi wu fen xi, ji ben kai kuo chu le Sichuan Pendi qing tong wen hua de qi yuan, fa zhan, xing sheng he shuai wang de quan guo cheng.
Qing tong shi dai wen hua
本书是作者长期从事四川盆地青铜时代考古与历史研究的论文汇编，也是一部中国青铜时代区域文化研究的专著。作者试图按照考古学研究的正确途径，从典型遗址分析入手，逐渐综合上升至文化和文化系统的研究，并通过该地区重要的遗址和遗物分析，基本概括出了四川盆地青铜文化的起源，发展，兴盛和衰亡的全过程.

datafield.subfield: actes du Colloque organisé à Louvain-la-Neuve les 15 et 16 juin 2012 par le Centre d'Histoire des Religions Cardinal Julien Ries /
édités par René Lebrun et Agnès Degrève.
La mosaïque de l'eucharistie au monastère Mar Gabriel de Quartamin (Tur Abdin) /
Des dieux aux saints guérisseurs dans l'Égypte pharaonique et copte --
Divinités et cultes guérisseurs en Étrurie /
Faveurs et protections divines en Tabal à l'âge du Fer /
Santa, Runta, et Kubaba : divinités guérisseuses, protectrices des marins /
Le serpent d'airain : Yhwh une divinité guérisseuse? /
La fontaine du sanctuaire de Zeus Asbama (Tyane) /
Réflexions sur l'origine du dieu Asclèpios /
Justice divine, dieux guérisseurs, exorcismes et médecine : notes sur la gestion de la maladie en Mésopotamie ancienne /
Qu'est-ce qu'un dieu guérisseur? Réflexions à propos des aspects guérisseurs du dieu anatolien Mèn /
L'oracle sarpédonien dans la Vie et les Miracles de Sainte Thècle /
Le crocus et la déesse dans le monde cyclado-minoen /

Dans le présent volume le lecteur prendra connaissance des contributions importantes de spécialistes belges et français présentées à l'occasion d'un colloque organisé à l'Université catholique de Louvain les 15 et 16 juin 2012 par le Centre d'Histoire des Religions Cardinal Julien Ries; le thème se focalisait sur les dieux guérisseurs dans l'antiquité méditerranéenne. Une mise au point s'avérait nécessaire en raison des découvertes récentes. L'action de divinités bienfaisantes, de leurs lieux de culte et de leur impact sociologique est analysée, parfois dans une solution de continuité depuis l'antiquité lointaine jusqu'au début de l'ère chrétienne. Les régions concernées sont la Mésopotamie, l'Egypte, l'Anatolie, le monde minoen, hellénique, biblique et paléo-chrétien.

Ben shu you liang bu fen zu cheng, qi zhong fa jue jian bao 26 pian, yan jiu xing wen zhang 9 pian. Shou lu de mu zang zhong, ji you gui zu de da xing mu zang, you you yi ban ping min mu zang, ji you Liu Chao de shi qi tong xing xing zhi, you you ti xian Maanshan Diqu te se de shi li; ji lu de chu tu qi wu ji hu han kuo le Liu Chao wen wu de ge zhong qi xing he zhi di.
马鞍山六朝墓葬发掘与研究 /
本书由两部分组成，其中发掘简报26篇，研究性文章9篇。收录的墓葬中，即有贵族的大型墓葬，又有一般平民墓葬；既有六朝的时期的通行形制，又有体现马鞍山地区特色的实例；记录的出土器物几乎涵括了六朝文物的各种器形和质地。

生活・读书・新知三联书店,
本书是根据1984年初秋作者张光直在北京大学考古系的六次演讲记录整理而成,内容集中于宏观性探讨中国考古与一般性问题的关联.是20世纪80年代国内最为流行的考古学读物之一,分为'中国古代史在世界史上的重要性';'从世界古代史常用模式看中国古代文明的形成'等数讲内容.

datafield.subfield: Shi zhai shan gu dai tong zhu yi shu /

1956 nian zai Yunnan Jinning Shizhaishan fa ju de gu mu qun chu tu you san qian duo jian sui zang wu pin, you qing tong zhi sheng chan gong ju, sheng huo yong ju, bing qi ji tong gu, bian zhong deng. Ben ce xua ji bing qi bing shang de dong wu xing zhuan shi, zhi cang bei hu de rong qi gai shang de tong ren he dong wu, xing xiang sheng dong er jing zhi, you hen gao de yi shu shui pin.
1956年在云南晋宁石寨山发掘的古墓群出土有三千多件随葬物品，有青铜制生产工具，生活用具，兵器及铜鼓，编钟等。本册选辑兵器柄上的动物形装饰，贮藏贝觳的容器盖上的铜人和动物，形象生动而精致，有很高的艺术水平.

Beijing : Wen wu chu ban she, 2005
本书作者在收集, 查阅了大量的考古材料和历史文献的基础上, 对南京地区出土的大量的六朝瓦当--这一具有重要指示作用的实物进行了较为全面的研究, 并从文献学, 历史学, 考古学等层面对六朝都城的走向, 城市布局, 历史风貌等进行了探讨.

Zhang Tongxin, Huang Yongjiu bian zhu.
Dong Zhou Qin Han shi qi Jin xi nan wa dang yan jiu
Shanghai gu ji chu ban she,

Bai shu dui Xia Xian Yu Wang cheng kao gu diao cha he fa jue zhong suo huo de de 400 yu jian Dong Zhou Qin Han shi qi de wa dang jin xing le zheng li, fen su mian, wo wen, kui wen, wen zi, yu wen wu da lei, qi zhong yun wen lei shi Yu Wang cheng wa dang xi lie zhong zui ju te se zhe, gu you xi fen wei shou shou shi yun wen, yu long wen, qu chi yun wen, wang xin yun wen deng 13 lei. 400 yu jian wa dang yi ta pian wei zhu, bu qing chu zhe pei you xian tu, du zhe ke cong zhong liao jie Dong Zhou, Qin Han shi qi Yu Wang cheng wa dang de yi shu te dian. Yu Wang cheng ceng zuo wei zao qi Wei guo zhi du, Qin Han he dong jun zhi suo zai di yi ji Dong Han mo nian de lin shi shou du, gai di chu tu de wa dang you xaing dang de dai biao xing, ye you zhu yu wo men quan mian ren shi Huang He zhong xia you de wa dang shi yong qing kuang.
东周秦汉时期晋西南瓦当研究 /
张童心, 黄永久编著.
东周秦汉时期晋西南瓦当研究

该书对夏县禹王城考古调查和发掘中所获得的400余件东周秦汉时期的瓦当进行了整理，分素面、涡纹、夔纹、文字、云纹五大类，其中云纹类是禹王城瓦当系列中最具特色者，故又细分为兽首式云纹、云龙纹、曲尺云纹、网心云纹等13类。400余件瓦当以拓片为主，不清楚者配以线图，读者可从中了解东周、秦汉时期禹王城瓦当的艺术特点。禹王城曾作为早期魏国之都，秦。汉河东郡治所在地以及东汉末年的临时首都，该地出土的瓦当有相当的代表性，也有助于我们全面认识黄河中下游的瓦当使用情况.

本书根据史传姓书的记载，参以石刻方志，文集说部等材料，考证魏书官氏志里所载的胡姓，并涉及两汉以来的质子降胡和隋唐时代的番将胡商，总计考证了一百九十二姓，初步填补了我国历史领域一空白点--胡人胡氏问题，足供研究魏晋南北朝隋唐史和中国民族史的参考.

datafield.subfield: Han imperialism, Chinese literary style, and the economic imagination /

"Explores the politics of representation during the Han dynasty (206 BCE-220 CE), a pivotal time when China was asserting imperialist power on the Eurasian continent and expanding its local and long-distance markets. By juxtaposing well-known texts with recently excavated literary and visual materials, the author elaborates a new literary and cultural approach to Chinese economic thought"--

Introduction: Savage exchange -- [Part 1] Genres -- Abstraction : Qingzhong economics, literary fiction, and masters dialogue -- Quantification : poetic expenditure in the epideictic Fu -- Competition : historiography, ethnography, and narrative regulation -- [Part 2] Practices -- Alienation : kinship in the world economy -- Commensuration : counter-practices of money -- Coda: Counterhistory, connected histories, and comparative literature -- Appendix: Numismatic research on the Han dynasty lead ingots with blundered Greek (or foreign) inscription.
Qin and Han dynasties, 221 B.C.-220 A.D.

柴澤俊古建築修繕文集 =
Collected works of Chai Zejun on ancient architure [sic].
山西被誉为 "中国古代建筑的宝库" . 本书正是山西省古建专家柴泽俊从事各时代, 各类型古建筑调查, 保护和维修实践的科学总结. 全书分为调查研究篇, 修缮保护篇和其他三部分, 收录各时期的文章三十八篇, 并配有插图一百二十幅, 展示了他在古建保护与维修领域各方面的独到见解.
再论背景环境的价值理念 --
保护背景环境刻不容缓 --
山西几处重要木构古建筑构造 --

宋建晋祠圣母殿形制结构与法式特征 --
中国古建筑保护理念与《威尼斯宪章》 --

文物保护单位导游应重视的几个问题 --

datafield.subfield: European Science Foundation Exploratory Workshop on Wool Economy in the Ancient Near East and the Aegean: From the Beginnings of Sheep Husbandry to Institutional Textile Industry
Wool economy in the ancient Near East and the Aegean :
from the beginnings of sheep husbandry to institutional textile industry /
edited by Catherine Breniquet and Cécile Michel.

"The present volume gathers together the contributions presented at the European Science Foundation Exploratory Workshop on Wool Economy in the Ancient Near East and the Aegean: From the Beginnings of Sheep Husbandry to Institutional Textile Industry, which took place in Nanterre, November 7-10, 2012"--Foreword.
Wool economy in the Ancient Near East and the Aegean /
Bronze and Iron Age wools from Europe /
The expansion of sheep herding and the development of wool production in the Ancient Near East : an archaeozoological and iconographical approach /
Sheep, wool and textile production : an interdisciplinary approach on the complexity of wool working /
The archaeology of wool in early Mesopotamia : sources, methods, perspectives /
Lambs of the gods : the beginnings of the wool economy in proto-cuneiform texts /
The value of wool in early Bronze Age Mesopotamia : on the control of sheep and the handling of wool in the Presargonic to the Ur III Periods (c. 2400 to 2000 BC) /
Wool in the economy of Sargonic Mesopotamia /
From weighing wool to weaving tools : textile manufacture at Ebla during the early Syrian period in the light of archeaological evidence /
Some aspects of the wool economy at Ebla (Syria, 24th century BCE) /
Making textiles at Arslantepe, Turkey, in the 4th and 3rd millennia BC : archaeological data and experimental archaeology /
Wool economy in the royal archive of Mari during the Šakkanakku Period /
All wool and a yard wide : wool production and trade in the Old Babylonian Sippar /
Wool trade in upper Mesopotamia and Syria according to Old Babylonian and Old Assyrian texts /
Wool in Anatolia in the Old Assyrian period /
Wool economy in Minoan Crete before Linear B : a minimalist position /
Wool production and economy at Ugarit /
Sheep rearing, wool production and management in Mycenaean written documents /
Mycenaean wool economies in the latter part of the 2nd millennium BC Aegean /
Wool, hair and textiles in Assyria /
"If you have a sheep, you have all you need" : sheep husbandry and wool in the economy of the Neo-Babylonian Ebabbar Temple at Sippar /
Fabrics and clothes from Mesopotamia during the Achaemenid and Seleucid periods : the textual references /

Hubei sheng bo wu guan cong shu

Ben shu shou Hubei Sheng Yunmeng Xian chu tu de 150 yu mei zhu jian (zong ji 283 ge bian hao) bao kuo mu zang gai kuang, zhu jian shi wen, kao shi, zhu jian wen zi tong jian, zhu jian tu ban he mo ben. Ci jian du wen Qin dai zhong yao de fa lu wen shu, dui Qin shi, Qin lu, kao gu xue, gu wen zi xue, jian du xue deng xue ke you zhong yao de can kao jia zhi.
Beijing : Ke xue chu ban she : Xin hua shu dian Beijing fa xing suo fa xing, 1997
新华书店北京发行所发行,
本书收入湖北省云梦县龙岗出土的150余枚竹(简总计283个整理编号)包括墓葬概况，竹简释文，考释，竹简文字通检，竹简图版和摹本。此简牍为秦代重要的法律文书，对秦史，秦律，考古学，古文字学，简牍学等学科有重要的参考价值.

Art archaeology and Buddhist art of the Han-Tang period
Table of contents and synopsis also in English.

Ben shu shou lu le zuo zhe zhuan xie de guan yu Zhongguo Han Tang mei shu kao gu he fo jiao yi shu lun wen 37 pian. Di yi zu kao gu lun wen 24 pian, zhong dian lun shu le Han Tang zhi jian de zang su, mu shi bi hua, tao yong yi ji you guan wen wu de yi shu te zheng yu yuan yuan liu bian, kao gu fa xian yu Zhongguo gu dai jia ju shi yan jiu, yi ji hai dong zhu gu guo wen hua jiao liu. Di er zu lun wen 10 pian, lun shu Zhongguo fo jiao yi shu. Di san zu shi 3 pian zong shu.
Han Tang mei shu kao gu he fo jiao yi shu.
Beijing : Ke xue chu ban she, 2000
汉唐美术考古和佛敎艺术 /
本书收录了作者历年撰写的关于中国汉唐美术考古和佛敎艺术论文37篇。第一组考古论文24篇，重点论述了汉唐之间的葬俗，墓室壁画，陶俑以及有关文物的艺术特征与渊源流变，考古发现与中国古代家具史研究，以及与海东诸古国的文化交流。第二组论文10篇，论述中国佛教艺术。第三组是3篇综述.

代陶器、印纹陶及骨制印纹具的联想 /
近年来殷墟边缘区域考古概述 /
从夏商宫殿发展谈殷墟宫殿宗庙遗址的特殊性 /
安阳博物馆馆藏殷商青铜礼器研究 /
安阳市新出土殷墟玉器的无损分析检测报告 /
以妇好偶方彝为例看殷商时期鸟图腾文化的传承 /
殷墟玉器的审美取向及其民族特征 /
盘庚迁殷的地望与洹北商城 /
商代监察制度钩沉浅论 /
浅析河南永城柿同汉墓壁画在早期丧葬绘画发展中的地位与作用 /
有关加拿大汉学家明义士博士及其故居几个存疑问题的研究 /
从汉字之源看民族文化之根 /
盘古传说的中国因素分析 /
安阳七朝古都沿革概说 /
八大古都 : 中华民族灿烂文明的高峰和撑点 /
本书收集了研究甲骨文和殷墟文化的论文30余篇。研究领域涉及到甲骨文、青铜器、陶器、玉器及殷墟考古、甲骨文书法、文物保护与鉴定等多个方面，代表了安阳市学术研究的新水平。

Wang Jiehua, Mao Ying, Liu Liwen zhu.

王结华, 毛颖, 刘丽文著.
本书通过对越王宝剑, 会稽铜镜和越窑青瓷的综合研究, 力图梳理出这些古越遗珍的渊源关系, 还原出这些古越遗珍的历史原貌, 并进而揭示出它们的精神价值和文化内涵.

纪念裴李岗文化发现30周年暨学术研讨会
裴李岗文化是中国新石器时代具有代表性的考古学文化. 本书汇编了20世纪70年代裴李岗文化的发现与研究状况, 探讨了裴李岗文化的内涵、年代、分期、葬式葬俗、生产生活、社会发展阶段、文化源流等问题.

datafield.subfield: Qin Han du cheng yu zi ran huan jing guan xi yan jiu /
Xi bei da xue wen hua yi chan yan jiu cong shu

Ben shu shi 2004 nin shen qing de Guo jia she ke ji jin Qin Han du cheng yu zi ran huan jing guan xi yan jiu (pi zhun hao: 04xzs006) de cheng guo. Qin Han shi qi shi Zhongguo li shi shang de yi ge fei chang zhong yao de shi qi, zai Zhongguo li shi shang chan sheng le ji wei zhong yao de zuo yong, er du cheng zai zhe yi shi qi de zuo yong you wei zhong yao, yi wei ta shi dang shi de zheng zhi, jing ji, wen hua he jun shi zhong xin, dang shi de ge xiang zheng ling, zhi du jun dan sheng yu ci, dui hou shi chan sheng le ji wei zhong yao de ying xiang, yin ci yan jiu Qin Han shi qi de du cheng wu yi dui yu yan jiu dang shi de she hui de fang fang mian mian ju you shi fen zhong yao de yi yi.
秦汉都城与自然环境关系研究 /
西北大学文化遗产研究丛书

本书是2004年申请的国家社科基金秦汉都城与自然环境关系研究 (批准号: 04xzs006) 的成果. 秦汉时期是中国历史上的一个非常重要的时期, 在中国历史上产生了极为重要的作用. 而都城在这一时期的作用尤为重要, 因为它是当时的政治、经济、文化和军事中心, 当时的各项政令、制度均诞生于此, 对后世产生了极为重要的影响. 因此研究秦汉时期的都城无疑对于研究当时的社会的方方面面具有十分重要的意义.
Xi bei da xue wen hua yi chan yan jiu cong shu.
西北大学文化遗产研究丛书.

Zhu yao nei rong bao kuo shi qi shi dai--qing tong shi dai kao gu yan jiu, Bei fang xu mu--you mu min zu de kao gu xue yan jiu, Qu yu xing ju luo kao gu ji qi huan jing kao gu xue.
Bei fang kao gu lun wen ji.
Beijing : Ke xue chu ban she, 2004
本书汇集了作者在内蒙古中南部史前考古和北方民族考古方面的研究成果20篇。主要内容包括石器时代--青铜时代考古学研究, 北方畜牧--游牧民族的考古学研究, 区域性聚落考古及其环境考古学。

datafield.subfield: Gu dai Zhongguo Dongbei min zu di qu jian zhi shi /

Ben shu cong Dongbei Diqu zhe yi dian xing di qu de ge an ru shou, cong guo jia jie gou jiao du yan jiu Dongbei min zu di qu jian zhi de qi yuank zhuan xing yu fa zhan, tan tao gu dai ge shi qi Dongbei ge zu di qu jian zhi de xing shi te dian yu zheng zhi gong neng, lun zheng ta dui gu dai zhong yang ji quan guo jia de fa zhan yu gong gu suo qi de zhong yao zuo yong.
古代中国东北民族地区建置史 /
本书从东北这一典型地区的个案入手，从国家结构的角度研究东北民族地区建置的起源，转型与发展，探讨古代各时期东北名族地区建置的形式特点与政治功能，论证它对古代中央集权国家的发展与巩固所起的重要作用.

"This volume comprises all but one of the papers presented at the workshop Unearthing the Wilderness : Workshop on the History and Archaeology of the Negev and Edom in the Iron Age, held at the W. F. Albright Institute of Archaeological Research, Jerusalem, on 12 December 2010. It is supplemented with studies from scholars who were unable to attend the conference but were eager to contribute to this book." -- Preface.
